title: Thai Movie - Eek Krang (Once More) with Bird Thongchai (1988)
description:
Eek Krang (Once More)

Thai movie (1988)
Drama/Romance

Language: Thai
NO SUBTITLES

2 VCD&#039;s
Playing time: 83 minutes
Image and Sound quality: Moderate

starring Bird (Thongchai McIntyre), Unchalee
Jongkhadikij

This  movie  is  the  second  time  that  Pi Bird and Pi Puh (Unchalee) played  together after the  movie "Duay rak kue rak". 

Plot (written by a Thai person):
Pi Bird was a business man who was playboy and Pi Puh was a working woman who worked in his friend&#039;s company. He met her when he visited his friend at her office and fell in love her just on first sight. He tried to make her to be interested in him and he was successful. Finally, they became a couple. Pi Puh had a friend who wanted to be a famous actress. They helped her to play a movie of a famous director. Her friend loved the director who was playboy. That director broke her heart and that made she so sad. At the end she killed herself. They both were so sad for her passing away.
